name: Turf War
text:
Choose two —
• Earthshake 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on target land you control. You may have it become a 0/0 Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land.)
• Return target creature to its owner's hand.
• Turf War deals 2 damage to any target.
• Target creature you control fights target creature you don’t control.
